name: Real Panda Mount Stick Arcade
description:
Real Panda Mount stick Arcade is for you with thrilling and addictive game features. Panda can’t jump from one upper most point to another mount place. Panda is very hungry so allow him to climb on bamboo stick to cover up the distance. Panda love to climb on bamboo tree. Panda will not stop and will eat and eat and eat everything. Panda will run for food until his life is secure. But this crazy panda take a lot of risk for food. If your bamboo stick is too larger or smaller than your panda will be fall down. Pick up bamboo stick like a bridge and panda will cross this bridge easily from one pillar to another pillar. A bamboo secret for you cross the farthest reach.
Cute panda is in trouble and it’s crazy for food and can’t jump from one pillar to another bamboo pillar. Panda Mount has the only chance to cross the mount place. Panda Mount stick is crazy to climb so he is always ready for climbing on bamboo tree and use it as a pull. Your job is to safe your panda. Click on screen and bamboo will grow fast. Panda love bamboo tree and he will definitely use bamboo from crossing hurdles. Save the unstoppable panda from falling down and going into die. When your bamboo tree length will not match the farthest platform than your Mount Panda will slip down. Climb your panda and land him safely.
